All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CreateUserDTO
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for creating a new user.
EmailAlreadyTakenException
Exception thrown when attempting to register or update a user with an email address that is already in use.
EmailBusyException
Exception thrown when an email address is already associated with an active or pending process, and cannot be used at the moment.
EmailValidationServiceImpl
Service implementation for validating email addresses.
EmailValidationServiceInterface
Interface defining methods for email validation services.
FollowerValidationServiceImpl
Service implementation for validating follower and following counts.
FollowerValidationServiceInterface
Interface defining methods for validating follower-related data.
GetUserDTO
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for retrieving user details.
IncorrectEmailFormatException
Exception thrown when an email address does not adhere to the expected format.
IncorrectPasswordFormatException
Exception thrown when a password does not adhere to the expected format.
IncorrectPhoneNumberException
Exception thrown when a phone number does not adhere to the expected format.
KafkaConfig
Configuration class for Apache Kafka integration.
LoggingAspect
Aspect for centralized logging of application methods.
MediaClient
Represents a Feign client for interacting with the Media Service.
MediaValidationServiceImpl
Service implementation for validating media resources associated with users.
MediaValidationServiceInterface
Interface for validating media-related operations for users.
OpenUserDTO
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for exposing public user details.
PasswordValidationServiceImpl
Service implementation for validating passwords based on specified rules.
PasswordValidationServiceInterface
Interface for validating user passwords.
PhoneNumberAlreadyTakenException
Exception thrown when a phone number is already taken by another user.
PhoneValidationServiceImpl
Service implementation for validating phone numbers.
PhoneValidationServiceInterface
Interface for validating phone numbers.
PostClient
Represents a Feign client for interacting with the Post Service.
PostValidationServiceImpl
Service implementation for validating and retrieving post-related data for users.
PostValidationServiceInterface
Interface for validating post-related operations.
RedisConfig
Configuration class for Redis caching.
SubscriptionClient
Represents a Feign client for interacting with the Subscription Service.
SwaggerConfig
Configuration class for Swagger API documentation.
User
Represents a User entity in the system.
UserActivityValidationServiceImpl
Service implementation for validating user activity-related information during user updates.
UserActivityValidationServiceInterface
Interface for user activity validation services.
UserController
 
UsernameIsBusyException
Exception thrown when a username is already taken by another user.
UserProcessorImpl
Implementation of UserProcessorInterface for handling user-related processing logic.
UserProcessorInterface
Interface for user processor services.
UserRepository
Repository interface for managing User entities.
UserServiceApplication
Main entry point for the User Service application.
UserServiceImpl
Implementation of the UserServiceInterface, providing user management functionality.
UserServiceInterface
Interface for user service operations.
ValidationServiceImpl
Service implementation that coordinates various validation tasks related to user information.
ValidationServiceInterface
Interface for validation services across various user-related operations.
